body.name: ULANZI MT-44 Extendable Phone Tripod, 59" Selfie Stick Phone Vlog Tripod Stand with 2 in 1 Phone Clip, 360° Ball Head Camera Tripod for iPhone Sony Canon GoPro, Lightweight for Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 12 mins
features: ▶【Universal Phone & Camera Tripod with 2 in 1 Integrated Design】Featuring in upgraded and integrated design, MT-44 tripod expands itself in the usage of other smart devices other than phone. The adjustable clip on the top can be expanded to universal phone clip to 60-80 mm which is compatible with most of smart phone, and can be gathered to storage camera through the 1/4" screw thread

▶【360° Panoramic Ballhead for Horizontal & Vertical Shooting】Designed with 360 rotatable degree universal ballhead, our phone & camera tripod can adjust various angles for shooting, allowing you to capture the perfect shot. Tighten the knob adjustment on the ball head, and you can lock to a certain fixed angle

▶【Telescopic Design】The 7-section ABS-made tripod enables fast and fumble-free set-up, making it to easy extend from 13"/340mm to 59"/1500mm which is longer than similar tripod on the market. Just rotate the lock knob and extend at a certain height where you want to meet your different shooting needs

▶【Cold Shoe & 1/4" Screw Thread for Rich Expansion】Based on diversified needs, we have specially designed cold shoe and 1/4" screw thread which is convenient for external photographic camera auxiliary equipment. Cold shoe on the top of clip allows you to mount a microphone or led video light for selfie Vlog. The 1/4" screw allows you to mount a phone holder, camera or other device

▶【Wide Compatibility】The extendable tripod can works as handle grip or selfie stick, mini and lightweight. Benefiting by the adjustable holder and standard adapter 1/4" screw thread, the vlog ​tripod is fully compatible with DSLR Camera Nikon Canon G7 Fujifilm Sony RX Panasonic Nikon D610, the photography tripods also works well with iPhone 12/11/11 pro/11 pro max/xs/xs max/8, Samsung, Huawei
body.description: ULANZI MT-44 Extendable Vlog Tripod Vlog Now with Ulanzi Designed to fit with popular mobile phones and cameras, MT-44 Multi-Extendable Vlog Tripod is equipped with cold shoe and supports 1/4" universal screws for rich expansion. Featuring in upgraded and integrated design, The adjustable clip on the top can be expanded to fit phone and gathered to storage camera. 360° detachable ball head can be adjusted various angles for shooting, allowing you to capture the perfect shot. Don't be afraid of breaking, bend out the shape you want. Two-in-one Phone Holder Design Support Horizontal and Vertical Shooting 360° Detachable Ballhead Cold Shoe & 1/4" Screw for Rich Expansion 7-section Telescopic Design

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About US: Founded in 2016 by a team of the photographer lovers, our original vision is not only to collect high quality and stylish products from the world, but also to develop own products with fabulous and yet practical design. We specialize in the development of mobile phone photography and other photographic equipment accessories, mainly based on mobile video accessories such as mobile phone stabilizer, rigs, microphone, LED lights, fixed bracket, lens, tripod,action camera accessories,etc. ULANZI MT-44 Extendable Vlog Tripod Vlog Now with Ulanzi Designed to fit with popular mobile phones and cameras, MT-44 Multi-Extendable Vlog Tripod is equipped with cold shoe and supports 1/4" universal screws for rich expansion. Featuring in upgraded and integrated design, The adjustable clip on the top can be expanded to fit phone and gathered to storage camera. 360° detachable ball head can be adjusted various angles for shooting, allowing you to capture the perfect shot. Don't be afraid of breaking, bend out the shape you want. Two-in-one Phone Holder Design Support Horizontal and Vertical Shooting 360° Detachable Ballhead Cold Shoe & 1/4" Screw for Rich Expansion 7-section Telescopic Design

Universal 1/4" Screw Fit with most cameras with 1/4" screw, like sports camera GoPro, digital cameras etc; ( Note: GoPro adapter not included in the package ). The max loading weight of tripod is 1.5kg/ 3.3lbs. Adjustable Phone Holder Phone mount can be extended from 6 cm to 8 cm; Not like spring-loaded phone clip, it's more stable and safe to grip your phone; Widely compatible with most smartphones in the market. Non-slip Handle Considerate silicon handle design protects from slipping. Meanwhile it also increases friction and hold firmly when use as selfie stick. Mini Pocket Size Take the MT-44 phone tripod anywhere you go. This tripod features lightweight and portable. Easily fits in your bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tripod for the Oslo Pocket 3
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was watching a YouTube video and someone said to buy this and I said "OK!"Glad I did as it's a great addition to my Osmo Pocket 3 set up. I have a "high end" tripod that I've been using but it just looks ridiculous to carry that around with the Osmo.Before I get to pros and cons: This tripod is deceiving in terms of its size. So much in fact that when I received it I thought it was missing a piece. In my brain there was no way it was going to extend to 5 feet given how compact it is when closed. I was wrong. It's great.Pros:-Very compact. Can fit in a bag easily-Extends up to 59"-Sturdy for items like and iPhone or DJI Osmo Pocket-Price, you can't beat it.-Easy to set up, close and adjustCons:-Makes for a clunky selfie stick. In a pinch it can work but the handle size and weight are not what I'm used to in a selfie stick. Not that it's heavy but selfie sticks usually have thinner handles and weight next to nothing.-Opening the base isn't as smooth as I would like for it to be. It's not hard it's just not a seamless as the rest of the functions.Overall this is well worth the money and gives me the ability to trust that my device won't fall over all while ditching my massive tripod that makes me looks ridiculous when I carry it out in public.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s sturdy but can’t hold the weight of your life’s baggage
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite tripod stand. It is versatile, switching from being able to hold a mobile phone then over to holding a point and shoot camera that you can screw in. And all without having to take off and replace any parts. The downside from every other rig and selfie stick and tripod is that there are just too many parts. So many get lost and then having to replace simple pieces becomes a hassle. This allows you to just have a simple all in one pocket tripod. ***SOMETHING TO NOTE: this tripod does not come with a wireless Bluetooth remote control/shutter button attached. You will have to use self timer or have a blue tooth shutter button if you plan on taking far away selfies or what have you.***I have so many blue tooth remotes so the absence of one with this tripod is okay with me.Another small favorite thing about this tripod is that it has a ball joint. Others will have latches or things that click and turn. The ball joint allows you to get angles without too much movement or displacement of where you had the tripod standing initially. It’s easy to useThis pocket tripod is worth buying. If you have a heavy camera/DSLR or video cam. It may not be able to hold the weight of how expensive your equipment was. It will slowly sink. This is for casual use with a phone and or point and shoot or a webcam.If you want a steel sturdy tripod. Look for one that meets the weight requirements of your gear combined.I will probably get myself another one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Fav Tripod
reviews.reviewText: I have had a few tripods now and this is by far the best for day to day and portable. It can fit in most of my medium sized purses, any tote back, slips into the side pockets of backpacks, can be handheld on the go and no one even noticed or questions, but then it pulls out to above eye level. Extremely sturdy for how long it extends. Holds my phone snug without fail and holds my canon g7x mark ii when there is no wind. Quick to adjust to get right for that perfect shot. I guess you can also use it as a selfie stick. Love the white + pink too. Great quality, versatile, impressive design, effortlessly convenient

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: So far the product has held up pretty well. I have used it in windy conditions with my Sony a6400 and it stood strong throughout the time I was using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this travel tripod!
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 more to complete my travel setup. 1 for camera 2 for mini RGB lights. The lights weigh next to nothing - however the height and the ball head rotation in this is PERFECT for versatility. Ulanzi is killing the game!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome with just One Weakness
reviews.reviewText: Love this little extension pod! I bought two of them for small LED lights where mounting the lights on regular light stands would be difficult or cumbersome due to space considerations. They're exactly as described online, but the one weakness I've found are the plastic legs. I suspected them to be plastic based on the video. I can confirm they are plastic and may not hold up to reckless usage so if you do buy these just keep in mind that in order to help them last just don't overload or stress them and they'll be fine. They hold up great for small LEDs and very light cameras, phones or action cams. They nicely double as a selfie stick and the built in 1/4" and phone holder is brilliant by design. I will keep both of them and would by again if I more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for iPhones & Compact Cameras
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This well-built tripod is easy to carry & use and setup is effortless. Great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lowers on its own
reviews.reviewText: Everything works great except the height. It doesn’t lock, so it starts to lower gradually on its own. It I touch whatever is on it, it lowers easily. Wish there was a way to lock the extension.Other than that, it works fine.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lo recomiendo mucho buen producto para el gym
reviews.reviewText: Mi intención era buscar un tripode para poder grabar mis rutinas en y frente el espejo en el gym, este sin duda para mí ha sido la mejor inversión , por el costo y los materiales se sienten de muy buena calidad , me hubiera gustado que el soporte que sostiene al teléfono fuese de otro tipo y no de resorte ya que con el paso del tiempo tiene a romperse pero de momento todo perfecto .

Cheguei no link desse produto através de uma recomendação do Instagram, já tinha gostado no vídeo e comprei pra testar, e é realmente muito bom! Tem me ajudado muito no meu trabalho.Só demorou bastante na entrega, mas quando chegou esqueci da demora rsrs valeu a pena
tres bon produit je l'ai utiliser souvent et je trouve que ca m'est tres pratique, bien construit et tres durable et robuste

Stativ macht einen überraschend hochwertigen Eindruck. Bin wirklich sehr zufrieden. Das Teleskop ist jedoch etwas sensibel eine DSLR wie meine EOS 90D würde ich da nicht draufstellen. Für Handys oder Kompakte absolut top!

reviews.reviewTitle: Più portatile di questo non si può
reviews.reviewText: Doppio utilizzo, sia per smartphone che per fotocamere compatte o bridge non troppo pesanti, piccolo e leggero (considerando che arrivato ad 1 metro) nello zaino non può mancare
